summary: A force of loners and fighters is put together to try and rescue Generals that are captured by the Japanese and save the war effort with the promise of gold and/or pardons of past crimes.
cast: Jackie Chan|Brigitte Lin|Jimmy Wang Yu|Yueh Sun|David Tao|Jing Fang|Shiu Bu Lia|Frankie Kao|Adam Cheng|Ling Chang|Paul Chang Chung|Hung-Lieh Chen|Fu Hung Cheng|Pin Chin|Ti Chin|Hsiang-Ping Hu|Ti-Men Kan|You-Min Ko|Chun Kuo|Ying Lee|Kun Li|Chie-Wen Lin|Wan-Chang Lin|Yang Tan|Ru-De Tsai|Chi Tung|Ma-Li Wang
keywords: japan|kung fu master|kung fu classic|kung fu fighting|kung fu
title: Fantasy Mission Force
